ygData.subject: RE: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well yes 787 plat is the floor price for medium armor for me. Easily, even after buffing CHA WAY past what i could normally get and using Carillon it never
ygData.messageBody:
>With more charisma, you should be able to get it for 787.5pp.
>
>Here's my best price list again for small steel plate:
>
>787.5 Breastplate
>346.5 Boots
>252 Bracers
>420 Greaves
>294 Belt
>147 Collar
>483 Gloves
>336 Arms
>367.5 Pauldron
>367.5 Helm
>105 Mask
>399 Cloak
>
>The "hidden" base price is 5% below this (price/1.05). The
>best selling price is 5% below that. Needless to say, all my
>friends ask me to do their big-ticket buying/selling for them.
>
>Slowly saving up for the greaves (already have the breastplate
>and arms)...
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...

Well yes 787 plat is the floor price for medium armor for me. Easily, even
after buffing CHA WAY past what i could normally get and using Carillon it
never gets lower than 787 plat for a breastplate for me (i am half-elf,
medium armor only). However, i tried this with the small steel armor
merchants and couldn't get lower than 805 plat or so, which is fine cuz hey
if yer buying a full suit of steel you are rich anyways.

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 38th Chorus
Veeshan
